channel.title: I need help with this song i'm working on
channel.description: https://app.auxy.co/projects/h-_fSMcVqhvT6iyJH_0_9Q== so this is my song "Everything." and i'm ~okay~ with it but it needs some help. i would really appreciate it if anyone wanted to give feedback or remix. you WILL be credited in the soundcloud release!

item.title: I need help with this song i'm working on

item.title: I need help with this song i'm working on
item.dc:creator: chriswearly
item.description:
What??? This song is AMAZING!

Like wow, it deserves to be Featured!!

I honestly don’t have anything to say about it, other than it actually is super clean, and really nice to listen to. @Auxy check this song out!

The only tiny bit I would suggest is an extra bar or something at the end for a quieter fade-out, and to have an open bar at the end for stuff to reverb out.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with this song i'm working on
